title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union frock coat holding Company G, 12th New Hampshire Infantry Regiment forage cap next to unidentified woman in front of an American flag] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union frock coat holding Company G, 12th New Hampshire Infantry Regiment forage cap next to unidentified woman in front of an American flag] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quater-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 11.8 x 9.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather floral scroll motif. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: The Union Drummer Boy, Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, 2002. Subjects: United States.--Army--New Hampshire Infantry Regiment, 11th (1862-1865)--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Women--1860-1870. Couples--1860-1870. Flags--American--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.26935 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2083
